Class cardPile

  • java.lang.Object
    • cardPile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Card>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    cardPileFoundation, cardPileFreeCell, cardPileTableau, Deck

    public class cardPile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Card>
    Cardpile for the FreeCell. Implements a ArrayList based Stack to hold the cards
    Author:
    Mikael Hinton & Brian Belcher
